taxonomicnotes: In older literature this species is usually listed under the name Caridina japonica De Man, 1892.  Cai et al. (2006) demonstrated that C. multidentata Stimpson, 1860 is a senior synonym of C.japonica.
rationale: In literature, the species is known from Japan, Taiwan, Fiji and Madagascar (Cai et al. 2006), however the records from Fiji and Madagascar are considered erroneous and herein considered to refer to other species.  In view of the wide distribution in Japan and Taiwan, and the lack of any known, major threats the species is considered here as Least Concern.
assessor: De Grave, S., Shy, J. & Cai, X.
